item.title: 【UPSCALED】Christina Perri - A Thousand Years [4K AI Upscale | HEVC 10-bit | PCM]
item.description:
Genre: Pop, Stage & Screen
Style: Soundtrack
Year: 2011
Video Source: Apple Music, 1080p, thanks Son Maxime
Audio Source: Deezer, American Acoustic, thanks ЯОR

"A Thousand Years" (1000 Years) is a song recorded by American singer and songwriter Christina Perri, and written by Perri and David Hodges, for The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn – Part 1. The song was released as a digital download on October 18, 2011, worldwide, and serves as the second single for the movie. Perri re-recorded the song with vocals from Steve Kazee for The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn – Part 2.

The music video was released on October 26, 2011, on Perri's YouTube channel. It features a few clips from The Twilight Saga: Breaking Dawn – Part 1 interspersed between scenes with Perri singing in a room with a floor full of candles. Perri ends the video singing into a sunset. It has over 2 billion views, making it one of the top 100 most-viewed YouTube videos.

Release Info
The video track is upscaled to 4K with Topaz Video AI and encoded to HEVC 10-bit.
The PCM track is lossless (Deezer, CD quality), synced with Adobe Audition.
The timed lyrics are synced & edited. Enable the subtitles to see the lyrics.
